trans-unit.target: . (#53)

trans-unit.source: . Several unit tests that relied on the old-style representation had to be fixed.
trans-unit.target: . Several unit tests that relied on the old-style representation had to be fixed.

trans-unit.source: ActionInformation: don’t use a fixed set of properties for ActionInformation. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/232/)
trans-unit.target: ActionInformation: don’t use a fixed set of properties for ActionInformation. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/232/)

trans-unit.source: ActionInformation: extend the ActionInformation and ActionInfo classes to support a icon URL just like the newer Action class already does
trans-unit.target: ActionInformation:ampliar las clases ActionInformation y ActionInfo para soportar un URL de icono como ya lo hace la nueva clase Action

trans-unit.source: Actions and TypeInformation: Clear the compiled NNN_expr_object property when the NNN_expr property is cleared.
trans-unit.target: Acciones e información de tipo:Borrar la propiedad NNN_expr_objeto compilada cuando se borre la propiedad NNN_expr.

trans-unit.source: Actions: Add a link_target attribute to store a value for the final rendered link tag’s “target” attribute (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/376951)
trans-unit.target: Actions: Add a link_target attribute to store a value for the final rendered link tag’s “target” attribute (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/376951)

trans-unit.source: Actions: Added deprecation warnings to the ZMI actions tab and most listActions methods where old-style actions are found asking developers to move to new-style actions instead. These warnings allow us to remove old-style actions code by version 2.4.
trans-unit.target: Acciones:Se añadieron advertencias de depreciación a la pestaña de acciones del ZMI y a la mayoría de los métodos de listActions donde se encuentran acciones de estilo antiguo pidiendo a los desarrolladores que pasen a acciones de estilo nuevo en su lugar.Estas advertencias nos permiten eliminar el código de acciones de estilo antiguo de la versión 2.4.

trans-unit.source: Actions: Return None if ‘link_target’ is an empty string. This helps to avoid invalid empty ‘target’ attributes in HTML output.
trans-unit.target: Actions: Return None if ‘link_target’ is an empty string. This helps to avoid invalid empty ‘target’ attributes in HTML output.

trans-unit.source: ActionsTool: The “Action Providers” tab in the ZMI did not render actions from the WorkflowTool correctly since those are not ‘new-style’ actions. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/322300)
trans-unit.target: ActionsTool: The “Action Providers” tab in the ZMI did not render actions from the WorkflowTool correctly since those are not ‘new-style’ actions. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/322300)

trans-unit.source: Adapterize workflow storage lookups.
trans-unit.target: Adaptar las búsquedas de almacenamiento del flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: Add
trans-unit.target: Añade

trans-unit.source: Add POST-only protections to security critical methods. http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2007-0240)
trans-unit.target: Add POST-only protections to security critical methods. http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2007-0240)

trans-unit.source: Add a
trans-unit.target: Añade un

trans-unit.source: Add icons for Bootstrap ZMI. [icemac, dwt]
trans-unit.target: Añadir iconos para el ZMI de Bootstrap.[icemac,dwt]

trans-unit.source: Add more ZMI icons for the Zope 4 ZMI. (#47)
trans-unit.target: Add more ZMI icons for the Zope 4 ZMI. (#47)

trans-unit.source: Add more files types to the FSFile registrations.
trans-unit.target: Añade más tipos de archivos a los registros del FSFile.

trans-unit.source: Add support for
trans-unit.target: Añade el soporte para

trans-unit.source: Add support for Python 3.5 and 3.6. [ale-rt]
trans-unit.target: Añade soporte para Python 3.5 y 3.6.[ale-rt]

trans-unit.source: Add support for Python 3.7.
trans-unit.target: Añade soporte para Python 3.7.

trans-unit.source: Added
trans-unit.target: Añadido

trans-unit.source: Added CMFCore.FSRestMethod: ReST equivalent of FSSTXMethod.
trans-unit.target: Añadido CMFCore.FSRestMethod:ReST equivalente al FSSTXMethod.

trans-unit.source: Added a permissions.zcml file defining our own permissions. This was formerly done in Zope 2’s Products.Five.
trans-unit.target: Added a permissions.zcml file defining our own permissions. This was formerly done in Zope 2’s Products.Five.

trans-unit.source: Added dependency on the new
trans-unit.target: La dependencia añadida de la nueva

trans-unit.source: Added remove support to GenericSetup types tool exportimport handler.
trans-unit.target: Añadido el soporte para la herramienta de exportación e importación de los tipos de GenericSetup.

trans-unit.source: Added support for Python 3.8.
trans-unit.target: Añadido el soporte para Python 3.8.

trans-unit.source: Added two missing explicit InitializeClass calls.
trans-unit.target: Añadió dos llamadas explícitas perdidas de InitializeClass.

trans-unit.source: Allow customization from DirectoryViews to be redirected into alternate folders, and use manually-built clones. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/382)
trans-unit.target: Allow customization from DirectoryViews to be redirected into alternate folders, and use manually-built clones. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/382)

trans-unit.source: Avoid a shallow dependency on
trans-unit.target: Evite una dependencia superficial de

trans-unit.source: Avoid writing MemberData to the member data tool until properties are actually set. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Evite escribir MemberData en la herramienta de datos de miembros hasta que las propiedades estén realmente establecidas.[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Backport plone/collective.indexing#16 to use the catalog queue also when reindexing the object security. (#58)
trans-unit.target: Backport plone/collective.indexing#16 to use the catalog queue also when reindexing the object security. (#58)

trans-unit.source: Backport test setup fixes for Zope 2.13 compatibility.
trans-unit.target: La configuración de la prueba Backport corrige la compatibilidad con Zope 2.13.

trans-unit.source: CATALOG_OPTIMIZATION_DISABLED
trans-unit.target: CATALOG_OPTIMIZATION_DISABLED

trans-unit.source: CMFBTreeFolder: CMFBTreeFolders could not be used as the toplevel /Members container. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/441)
trans-unit.target: CMFBTreeFolder: CMFBTreeFolders could not be used as the toplevel /Members container. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/441)

trans-unit.source: CMFCatalogAware: Added ‘handleObjectEvent’ subscriber. This replaces the deprecated ‘manage_afterAdd’, ‘manage_afterClone’ and ‘manage_beforeDelete’ hooks.
trans-unit.target: CMFCatalogAware: Added ‘handleObjectEvent’ subscriber. This replaces the deprecated ‘manage_afterAdd’, ‘manage_afterClone’ and ‘manage_beforeDelete’ hooks.

trans-unit.source: CMFCatalogAware: Split up CMFCatalogAware mixin. CatalogAware, WorkflowAware and OpaqueItemManager are now separate mixins.
trans-unit.target: CMFCatalogAware:Dividir la mezcla de CMFCatalogAware.CatalogAware,WorkflowAware y OpaqueItemManager son ahora mezclas separadas.

trans-unit.source: CachingPolicyManager: Implemented the old OFS.Cache.CacheManager API. Now objects other than CMF content or CMF templates can have their caching headers set by the caching policy manager with the same fine-grained control. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/408)
trans-unit.target: CachingPolicyManager: Implemented the old OFS.Cache.CacheManager API. Now objects other than CMF content or CMF templates can have their caching headers set by the caching policy manager with the same fine-grained control. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/408)

trans-unit.source: CachingPolicyManager: Prevent firing of caching policies for templates (DTML or ZPT) that are rendered in-line (without a separate request) while rendering the requested content item’s view. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/456)
trans-unit.target: CachingPolicyManager: Prevent firing of caching policies for templates (DTML or ZPT) that are rendered in-line (without a separate request) while rendering the requested content item’s view. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/456)

trans-unit.source: CatalogTool: If proxy roles are set on a script that uses the catalog and those proxy roles have been unset using the ZMI, which results in an empty tuple as proxy roles, then the catalog would not correctly determine what the current user is allowed to see. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/161729)
trans-unit.target: CatalogTool: If proxy roles are set on a script that uses the catalog and those proxy roles have been unset using the ZMI, which results in an empty tuple as proxy roles, then the catalog would not correctly determine what the current user is allowed to see. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/161729)

trans-unit.source: CatalogTool: Use current executable’s proxy roles, if any, in place of user’s roles when computing ‘allowedRolesAndUsers’ for a query. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/380)
trans-unit.target: CatalogTool: Use current executable’s proxy roles, if any, in place of user’s roles when computing ‘allowedRolesAndUsers’ for a query. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/380)

trans-unit.source: Change
trans-unit.target: Cambiar

trans-unit.source: Change the default value of uid to None on CMFCatalogAware’s reindexObject method (#87)
trans-unit.target: Change the default value of uid to None on CMFCatalogAware’s reindexObject method (#87)

trans-unit.source: Changed GenericSetup import handlers to fail silently if they are called in a context that does not contain the items they import.
trans-unit.target: Cambió los controladores de importación de GenericSetup para que fallen silenciosamente si se los llama en un contexto que no contiene los artículos que importan.

trans-unit.source: Changed testing.py to directly load zope.traversing’s ZCML instead of going via the Five traversing.zcml BBB shim.
trans-unit.target: Changed testing.py to directly load zope.traversing’s ZCML instead of going via the Five traversing.zcml BBB shim.

trans-unit.source: Clean up test and linting configurations.
trans-unit.target: Limpiar las configuraciones de prueba y las pelusas.

trans-unit.source: Cleaned up / normalized imports:
trans-unit.target: Importaciones limpias/normalizadas:

trans-unit.source: Code cleanup: avoid to call the
trans-unit.target: Limpieza del código:evitar llamar al

trans-unit.source: Content: Added IFactory utilities for all content classes. They are now used by default instead of the old constructor methods.
trans-unit.target: Contenido:Añadidas utilidades de IFactory para todas las clases de contenido.Ahora se usan por defecto en lugar de los antiguos métodos de construcción.

trans-unit.source: Content: All content classes are now registered by ZCML. ContentInit is still used to register oldstyle constructors.
trans-unit.target: Contenido:Todas las clases de contenido están ahora registradas por ZCML.ContentInit se sigue usando para registrar constructores de estilo antiguo.

trans-unit.source: CookieCrumbler: Removed redirect support. The Unauthorized handling and redirects are now part of CMFDefault.
trans-unit.target: CookieCrumbler:Eliminado el apoyo de redireccionamiento.El manejo no autorizado y las redirecciones son ahora parte de CMFDefault.

trans-unit.source: DateTime 2.12.5 does away with a special case representing DateTime values for midnight (00:00:00) without their time and time zone values. So DateTimes formerly rendered as
trans-unit.target: DateTime 2.12.5 elimina un caso especial que representa los valores de DateTime para la medianoche (00:00:00)sin sus valores de hora y zona horaria.Así que DateTimes anteriormente se presentaba como

trans-unit.source: Deprecated unused method
trans-unit.target: Método desaprobado no utilizado

trans-unit.source: DirectoryView: Added ‘bobobase_modification_time’ method to FSObject. The “Contents” tab in the ZMI now shows useful ‘Last Modified’ values.
trans-unit.target: DirectoryView: Added ‘bobobase_modification_time’ method to FSObject. The “Contents” tab in the ZMI now shows useful ‘Last Modified’ values.

trans-unit.source: DirectoryView: Added ‘registerDirectory’ ZCML directive. Using the old registerDirectory method in __init__.py is now deprecated. See zcml.IRegisterDirectoryDirective for details.
trans-unit.target: DirectoryView: Added ‘registerDirectory’ ZCML directive. Using the old registerDirectory method in __init__.py is now deprecated. See zcml.IRegisterDirectoryDirective for details.

trans-unit.source: DirectoryView: Added support for non-product packages. This introduces new registry keys. Old registry keys stored in persistent DirectoryView objects are updated on the fly. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/467)
trans-unit.target: DirectoryView: Added support for non-product packages. This introduces new registry keys. Old registry keys stored in persistent DirectoryView objects are updated on the fly. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/467)

trans-unit.source: DirectoryView: Changed debug mode behavior. No additional subdirs are registered in debug mode. If you add new subdirs, you have to restart your instance. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/271027)
trans-unit.target: DirectoryView: Changed debug mode behavior. No additional subdirs are registered in debug mode. If you add new subdirs, you have to restart your instance. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/271027)

trans-unit.source: DirectoryView: Improved debug mode speed on NTFS partitions. The much faster non-Windows implementation is now used on Windows as well if non-FAT32 time stamps are detected. In rare cases that heuristic approach might fail to detected NTFS partitions.
trans-unit.target: DirectoryView:Mejora la velocidad del modo de depuración en las particiones NTFS.La implementación mucho más rápida fuera de Windows se usa ahora también en Windows si se detectan marcas de tiempo que no sean FAT32.En raros casos ese enfoque heurístico podría fallar al detectar particiones NTFS.

trans-unit.source: DirectoryView: Modernized debug mode lookup. Now getConfiguration().debug_mode is used instead of Globals.DevelopmentMode.
trans-unit.target: DirectoryView:Búsqueda modernizada de modo de depuración.Ahora se usa getConfiguration().debug_mode en lugar de Globals.DevelopmentMode.

trans-unit.source: DirectoryView: Removed support for deprecated old API.
trans-unit.target: DirectoryView:Se ha eliminado el soporte para la vieja y obsoleta API.

trans-unit.source: Discussion tool: Removed the listActions method that would return a hardcoded Reply action. This action has been handled by the Actions tool itself for a while now, and the Discussions tool was not set as an action provider anymore.
trans-unit.target: Herramienta de discusión:Eliminó el método de la lista de acciones que devolvería una acción de respuesta codificada.Esta acción ha sido manejada por la propia herramienta Acciones desde hace un tiempo,y la herramienta Discusiones ya no se estableció como un proveedor de acciones.

trans-unit.source: Do not autogenerate
trans-unit.target: No se autogeneren

trans-unit.source: Don’t fail on catalog inconsistency when doing
trans-unit.target: Don’t fail on catalog inconsistency when doing

trans-unit.source: DynamicType: Added ‘getIconURL’ method. This replaces the now deprecated ‘getIcon’ method.
trans-unit.target: DynamicType: Added ‘getIconURL’ method. This replaces the now deprecated ‘getIcon’ method.

trans-unit.source: DynamicType: Fixed behaviour regarding default view. DynamicType was making it impossible to use a Zope3-style default view for CMF content types. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/459)
trans-unit.target: DynamicType: Fixed behaviour regarding default view. DynamicType was making it impossible to use a Zope3-style default view for CMF content types. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/459)

trans-unit.source: DynamicType: Modified ‘icon’ method. The specified icon might be registered for a ZTK layer that is not available in the ZMI. If the icon can’t be found, an empty string is returned.
trans-unit.target: DynamicType: Modified ‘icon’ method. The specified icon might be registered for a ZTK layer that is not available in the ZMI. If the icon can’t be found, an empty string is returned.

trans-unit.source: Earlier releases
trans-unit.target: Lanzamientos anteriores

trans-unit.source: Ensure Content Type Registries don’t use a ZMI add dialog in the Zope 4 ZMI. (#72)
trans-unit.target: Ensure Content Type Registries don’t use a ZMI add dialog in the Zope 4 ZMI. (#72)

trans-unit.source: Events: Changed ‘handleContentishEvent’ behavior for IObjectCopiedEvent. ‘WorkflowTool.notifyCreated’ no longer resets the workflow state, so the the event subscriber clears the workflow history instead.
trans-unit.target: Events: Changed ‘handleContentishEvent’ behavior for IObjectCopiedEvent. ‘WorkflowTool.notifyCreated’ no longer resets the workflow state, so the the event subscriber clears the workflow history instead.

trans-unit.source: Events: Fixed some handleContentishEvent issues. Moved _clearLocalRolesAfterClone code to separate handler that is triggered before indexing and also for folders. Made sure notifyModified is not called if objects are just moved.
trans-unit.target: Eventos:Arreglados algunos problemas de "handleContentishEvent".Se movió el código de _clearLocalRolesAfterClone para separar el manejador que se activa antes de la indexación y también para las carpetas.Asegurarse de que no se llama a notifyModified si los objetos acaban de ser movidos.

trans-unit.source: Expose the Cookie Crumbler title property. (#70)
trans-unit.target: Expose the Cookie Crumbler title property. (#70)

trans-unit.source: Expose the ZMI manage view of the “_components” object manager as a new “Components Folder” tab in the ZMI.
trans-unit.target: Expose the ZMI manage view of the “_components” object manager as a new “Components Folder” tab in the ZMI.

trans-unit.source: FSFile
trans-unit.target: Fichero

trans-unit.source: FSFile.__str__
trans-unit.target: Archivo.

trans-unit.source: FSFile: Added registration for ‘txt’ extension.
trans-unit.target: FSFile: Added registration for ‘txt’ extension.

trans-unit.source: FSImage: Supply class-level defaults for ‘alt’, ‘height’, and ‘width’, to avoid acquiring objects with the same names. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/507)
trans-unit.target: FSImage: Supply class-level defaults for ‘alt’, ‘height’, and ‘width’, to avoid acquiring objects with the same names. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/507)

trans-unit.source: FSMetadata: Remove handling of .security and .properties metadata files which was supposed to have been removed in CMF 2.0 already.
trans-unit.target: FSMetadatos:Eliminar el manejo de los archivos de metadatos de .security y .properties que se suponía que ya habían sido eliminados en el CMF 2.0.

trans-unit.source: FSObject: Ensure that ZCache invalidations only happens if the filesystem modification time differs from the internally stored previous modification time. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/325246)
trans-unit.target: FSObject: Ensure that ZCache invalidations only happens if the filesystem modification time differs from the internally stored previous modification time. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/325246)

trans-unit.source: FSPageTemplate: Change the charset/encoding detection to consider charset specifications in the content type, and replace the hardcoded Latin-15 fallback with the mechanism used by the Products.PageTemplate code, which can be influenced by setting the environment variable “ZPT_PREFERRED_ENCODING” (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/322263)
trans-unit.target: FSPageTemplate: Change the charset/encoding detection to consider charset specifications in the content type, and replace the hardcoded Latin-15 fallback with the mechanism used by the Products.PageTemplate code, which can be influenced by setting the environment variable “ZPT_PREFERRED_ENCODING” (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/322263)

trans-unit.source: FSPageTemplate: Prevent reading the underlying file without doing anything with the data in some cases.
trans-unit.target: FSPageTemplate:Evitar la lectura del archivo subyacente sin hacer nada con los datos en algunos casos.

trans-unit.source: FSSTXMethod: Modernized, added tests, made customization possible (now renders via ZPT by default, using ‘main_template’).
trans-unit.target: FSSTXMethod: Modernized, added tests, made customization possible (now renders via ZPT by default, using ‘main_template’).

trans-unit.source: FSSTXMethod: Fixed Zope 2.12 compatibility. zope.structuredtext is now used instead of StructuredText.
trans-unit.target: FSSTXMethod:Fija la compatibilidad con Zope 2.12.Ahora se usa zope.structuredtext en lugar de StructuredText.

trans-unit.source: Factored support for FSZSQL methods out into a setup extra. If you need support for Filesystem ZSQL methods, install the egg specifying the
trans-unit.target: El soporte factorizado de los métodos FSZSQL se ha convertido en un extra de configuración.Si necesitas soporte para los métodos ZSQL del Filesystem,instala el huevo especificando el
FactoryTypeInformation: Added support for Zope3 style factories. If the ‘product’ property of a type info instance is empty the ‘factory’ property is interpreted as an IFactory name.

trans-unit.source: Fall back to DAV aware marshaller when importing or exporting folderish content, so types now retain their metadata when being round-tripped. [MatthewWilkes]
trans-unit.target: Recurrir al mariscal de campo de la DAV cuando se importa o exporta contenido de la carpeta,así que los tipos ahora conservan sus metadatos cuando se hacen viajes de ida y vuelta.[MatthewWilkes]

trans-unit.source: First egg release. For changes up through this release, please see the overall “CMF changelog”, http://svn.zope.org/CMF/tags/2.1.0/CHANGES.txt?rev=78713&view=markup
trans-unit.target: First egg release. For changes up through this release, please see the overall “CMF changelog”, http://svn.zope.org/CMF/tags/2.1.0/CHANGES.txt?rev=78713&view=markup

trans-unit.source: FiveActionsTool: Removed the tool and all functionality for bridging between Zope 3-style menu items and CMF actions. The CMF has been going a different route for a long time and the code is unused and unmaintained.
trans-unit.target: Herramienta "Cinco Acciones":Se ha eliminado la herramienta y toda la funcionalidad para hacer de puente entre los elementos del menú del estilo Zope 3 y las acciones del CMF.El CMF ha estado yendo por una ruta diferente durante mucho tiempo y el código no se usa ni se mantiene.

trans-unit.source: Fix
trans-unit.target: Arreglar

trans-unit.source: Fix an issue with the indexing queue where an UNINDEX followed by REINDEX was wrongly optimized to UNINDEX instead of REINDEX. (#96)
trans-unit.target: Fix an issue with the indexing queue where an UNINDEX followed by REINDEX was wrongly optimized to UNINDEX instead of REINDEX. (#96)

trans-unit.source: Fix content exportimport when Title or Description are unicode (merge from 2.2 branch).
trans-unit.target: Fijar la exportación e importación de contenido cuando el título o la descripción son unicode (fusión de la rama 2.2).

trans-unit.source: Fix content exportimport when Title or Description are unicode.
trans-unit.target: Fija la exportación e importación del contenido cuando el título o la descripción son unicode.

trans-unit.source: Fix deprecation warnings occurring during test runs.
trans-unit.target: Arreglar las advertencias de depreciación que se producen durante las pruebas.

trans-unit.source: Fix encoding detection for XML files. (#85)
trans-unit.target: Fix encoding detection for XML files. (#85)

trans-unit.source: Fix not declared dependency on
trans-unit.target: Arreglar la dependencia no declarada de

trans-unit.source: Fix tests to be able to run on Zope 4.3.
trans-unit.target: Arreglar las pruebas para poder correr en el Zope 4.3.

trans-unit.source: Fix up all ZMI forms to work better with the Zope 4 ZMI. (#73)
trans-unit.target: Fix up all ZMI forms to work better with the Zope 4 ZMI. (#73)

trans-unit.source: Fixed all componentregistry.xml files to use plain object paths and strip and slashes. GenericSetup does only support registering objects which are in the site root.
trans-unit.target: Arreglado todos los archivos componentregistry.xml para usar rutas de objetos simples y tiras y barras oblicuas.GenericSetup sólo soporta el registro de objetos que están en la raíz del sitio.

trans-unit.source: Fixed compatibility with non-string exceptions on Zope trunk.
trans-unit.target: Arreglada la compatibilidad con las excepciones de no-cuerdas en el tronco de Zope.

trans-unit.source: Fixed test breakage induced by use of Z3 pagetemplates in Zope 2.10+.
trans-unit.target: Fija la rotura de la prueba inducida por el uso de plantillas de páginas Z3 en el Zope 2.10+.

trans-unit.source: Fixed types tool test to only test creation for type infos.
trans-unit.target: Prueba de la herramienta de tipos fijos para probar sólo la creación de los tipos de información.

trans-unit.source: Fixed typo in the acquisition wrapping of the found utility in getToolByName.
trans-unit.target: Corregido el error tipográfico en el envoltorio de adquisición de la utilidad encontrada en getToolByName.

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of changes before version 2.1.0-alpha, see the HISTORY.txt file on the CMF-2.1 branch: https://web.archive.org/web/20130123004606/http://svn.zope.org/CMF/branches/2.1/HISTORY.txt?view=auto
trans-unit.target: For a complete list of changes before version 2.1.0-alpha, see the HISTORY.txt file on the CMF-2.1 branch: https://web.archive.org/web/20130123004606/http://svn.zope.org/CMF/branches/2.1/HISTORY.txt?view=auto

trans-unit.source: Get most tests working under Zope 2.13.0a2.
trans-unit.target: La mayoría de las pruebas funcionan bajo el Zope 2.13.0a2.

trans-unit.source: Got rid of redundant icon related type info properties. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/397795)
trans-unit.target: Got rid of redundant icon related type info properties. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/397795)

trans-unit.source: Import BeforeTraverseEvent from new location if available.
trans-unit.target: Importar BeforeTraverseEvent de la nueva ubicación si está disponible.

trans-unit.source: Improve the new indexing object wrapping for unindexing by using a module-level wrapper class based on zope.proxy instead of a class at method level. Some discussion available at GitHub PR #15. [dataflake]
trans-unit.target: Mejorar la nueva envoltura del objeto de indexación para la desindexación utilizando una clase de envoltura a nivel de módulo basada en zope.proxy en lugar de una clase a nivel de método.Alguna discusión disponible en GitHub PR #15.[copo de datos]

trans-unit.source: IndexableObjectWrapper: Made sure portal_type doesn’t return None. Products.ZCatalog 3 indexes can no longer handle None values.
trans-unit.target: IndexableObjectWrapper: Made sure portal_type doesn’t return None. Products.ZCatalog 3 indexes can no longer handle None values.

trans-unit.source: Load permissions.zcml from Products.Five in the test to fix tests with Zope 2.12.
trans-unit.target: Cargar permisos.zcml de Productos.Cinco en la prueba para arreglar las pruebas con el Zope 2.12.

trans-unit.source: Made calls to reindexObjectSecurity in the membership tool conditional after the CMFCatalogAware refactoring.
trans-unit.target: Hizo llamadas para reindexar la herramienta de membresía de ObjetoSeguridad condicionada después de la refactorización de CMFCatalogAware.

trans-unit.source: Make sure
trans-unit.target: Asegúrate de que

trans-unit.source: Make sure RegistrationTool.addMember is not published [vangheem]
trans-unit.target: Asegúrate de que RegistrationTool.addMember no se publique [vangheem]

trans-unit.source: Make the error raised when trying to rename an instance of ImmutableId indicate the id of the object.
trans-unit.target: Hacer que el error se plantee al tratar de renombrar una instancia de ImmutableId indicar el id del objeto.

trans-unit.source: MemberData tool: Make it easier to override the default MemberData implementation by trying to look up a named factory utility named “MemberData” before falling back on the default MemberData class. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/377208)
trans-unit.target: MemberData tool: Make it easier to override the default MemberData implementation by trying to look up a named factory utility named “MemberData” before falling back on the default MemberData class. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/377208)

trans-unit.source: MemberDataTool: Changed property modes to ‘w’ and added ‘fullname’ property.
trans-unit.target: MemberDataTool: Changed property modes to ‘w’ and added ‘fullname’ property.

trans-unit.source: MemberDataTool: Fixed tool initialization. The default boolean and date property values were not set correctly.
trans-unit.target: MemberDataTool:Inicialización de la herramienta fija.Los valores por defecto de las propiedades booleanas y de la fecha no se establecieron correctamente.

trans-unit.source: MemberDataTool: Modified ‘setProperties’ method. It now can be used by user managers as well.
trans-unit.target: MemberDataTool: Modified ‘setProperties’ method. It now can be used by user managers as well.

trans-unit.source: MemberDataTool: Removed obsolete MemberData factory lookup. This feature was added in CMF 2.2, but now the MemberAdapter should be overridden instead.
trans-unit.target: MemberDataTool:Eliminada la búsqueda de la fábrica de MemberData obsoleta.Esta característica fue añadida en el CMF 2.2,pero ahora el MemberAdapter debe ser anulado en su lugar.

trans-unit.source: MemberDataTool: Split up MemberData class. The old MemberData API is now provided by the new MemberAdapter. The persistent MemberData objects are just used for storing member data.
trans-unit.target: MemberDataTool:Dividir la clase de MemberData.La antigua API de MemberData es ahora proporcionada por el nuevo MemberAdapter.Los objetos persistentes de MemberData sólo se utilizan para almacenar datos de los miembros.

trans-unit.source: MembershipTool: Added ‘isMemberAccessAllowed’ method. If you don’t have the ‘Manage users’ permission for the membership tool, you shouldn’t have write access to other members.
trans-unit.target: MembershipTool: Added ‘isMemberAccessAllowed’ method. If you don’t have the ‘Manage users’ permission for the membership tool, you shouldn’t have write access to other members.

trans-unit.source: MembershipTool: Fixed inconsistent behavior where member lookup would take all user folders up to the Zope root into account whereas member area creation would not.
trans-unit.target: Herramienta de membresía:Se ha corregido el comportamiento inconsistente en el que la búsqueda de miembros tomaba en cuenta todas las carpetas de usuario hasta la raíz de Zope,mientras que la creación de áreas de miembros no lo hacía.

trans-unit.source: MembershipTool: Removed ancient LoginManager compatibility code and deprecated the no longer needed __getPUS method.
trans-unit.target: Herramienta de membresía:Eliminó el antiguo código de compatibilidad de LoginManager y desaprobó el ya no necesario método __getPUS.

trans-unit.source: MembershipTool: when using an object without a __nonzero__ but with a __len__ (ala CMFBTreeFolder) as a member folder, the createMemberArea method would believe there was no members folder if the folder was empty, and so would fail (change “not membersfolder” to “membersfolder is not None”) .
trans-unit.target: MembershipTool: when using an object without a __nonzero__ but with a __len__ (ala CMFBTreeFolder) as a member folder, the createMemberArea method would believe there was no members folder if the folder was empty, and so would fail (change “not membersfolder” to “membersfolder is not None”) .

trans-unit.source: Merged patches from Martin Aspeli to enable generating events before and after DCWorkflow transitions, and in the ‘notify’ methods of the workflow tool (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/461).
trans-unit.target: Merged patches from Martin Aspeli to enable generating events before and after DCWorkflow transitions, and in the ‘notify’ methods of the workflow tool (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/461).

trans-unit.source: No longer catch a
trans-unit.target: Ya no se puede atrapar a un

trans-unit.source: NotImplemented
trans-unit.target: No implementado

trans-unit.source: Optimize
trans-unit.target: Optimizar

trans-unit.source: PortalCatalog: Changed to use a multi-adaptor to allow a pluggable IndexableObjectWrapper class. Objects that implement IIndexableObject are not wrapped. The change will assist in integrating with other indexing strategies from third-party packages.
trans-unit.target: PortalCatalog:Cambiado para usar un multiadaptador para permitir una clase de Envoltura de Objeto Indexable enchufable.Los objetos que implementan IIndexableObject no están envueltos.El cambio ayudará a integrarse con otras estrategias de indexación de paquetes de terceros.

trans-unit.source: PortalCatalogProcessor.get_dispatcher
trans-unit.target: PortalCatalogProcessor.get_dispatcher

trans-unit.source: PortalFolder: Enabled ‘Components’ ZMI tab. This GenericSetup tab allows to inspect and edit component registrations.
trans-unit.target: PortalFolder: Enabled ‘Components’ ZMI tab. This GenericSetup tab allows to inspect and edit component registrations.

trans-unit.source: PortalFolder: Ensure that pasting an object into a folder takes workflow instance creation conditions into account. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/308947)
trans-unit.target: PortalFolder: Ensure that pasting an object into a folder takes workflow instance creation conditions into account. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/308947)

trans-unit.source: PortalFolder: Modified allowedContentTypes method to check isConstructionAllowed only for allowed types, not for all content types.
trans-unit.target: PortalFolder:El método de comprobación de los tipos de contenido modificados es "Construcción".Sólo se permite para los tipos permitidos,no para todos los tipos de contenido.

trans-unit.source: PortalFolder: Removed unused ICatalogAware and IWorkflowAware methods.
trans-unit.target: PortalFolder:Se han eliminado los métodos no utilizados de ICatalogAware e IWorkflowAware.

trans-unit.source: PortalObject: Added setSite to getSiteManager for old instances. This fixes migrations from Plone 2.1 to 3.0.
trans-unit.target: PortalObject:Añadido setSite a getSiteManager para las instancias antiguas.Esto arregla las migraciones de Plone 2.1 a 3.0.

trans-unit.source: PortalObject: Fixed a bug in the site manager creation code, which would assign the __parent__ pointer to the Aq-wrapper and not the actual object.
trans-unit.target: PortalObject:Se ha corregido un error en el código de creación del administrador del sitio,que asignaba el puntero __parent__al Aq-wrapper y no al objeto real.

trans-unit.source: PortalObject: Removed backwards compatibility code in getSiteManager. Please use CMFDefault’s upgrade steps for upgrading old CMF sites.
trans-unit.target: PortalObject: Removed backwards compatibility code in getSiteManager. Please use CMFDefault’s upgrade steps for upgrading old CMF sites.

trans-unit.source: Prevent warnings on Zope start about permissions for not existing methods. This requires
trans-unit.target: Evitar que las advertencias en Zope empiecen sobre los permisos de los métodos no existentes.Esto requiere

trans-unit.target: Productos.CMFCore

trans-unit.target: Productos.CMFCore Cambios

trans-unit.target: Products.GenericSetup >= 2.0b5

trans-unit.source: Products.ZSQLMethods
trans-unit.target: Productos.ZSQLMétodos

trans-unit.source: Profiles: All profiles are now registered by ZCML.
trans-unit.target: Perfiles:Todos los perfiles están ahora registrados por ZCML.

trans-unit.source: Properties export/import: Get the string encoding for property imports from the import context and fall back to UTF-8, which mirrors the behavior for exports. This fixes property export/import round tripping. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/248853)
trans-unit.target: Properties export/import: Get the string encoding for property imports from the import context and fall back to UTF-8, which mirrors the behavior for exports. This fixes property export/import round tripping. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/248853)

trans-unit.source: Provide a
trans-unit.target: Proporcionar un

trans-unit.source: Python 2 / 3 compatible imports. [rudaporto]
trans-unit.target: Importaciones compatibles con Python 2/3.[rudaporto]

trans-unit.source: Queue and process indexing operations (index, reindex, unindex) at transaction boundaries. This allows to reduce redundant operations and thus improving performance. Operations are processed just at transaction boundaries or whenever a catalog search is performed. Part of PLIP 1343: https://github.com/plone/Products.CMFPlone/issues/1343 [gforcada]
trans-unit.target: Queue and process indexing operations (index, reindex, unindex) at transaction boundaries. This allows to reduce redundant operations and thus improving performance. Operations are processed just at transaction boundaries or whenever a catalog search is performed. Part of PLIP 1343: https://github.com/plone/Products.CMFPlone/issues/1343 [gforcada]

trans-unit.source: Redid most filesystem content type ZMI Customize views.
trans-unit.target: Rehacer la mayoría de los contenidos del sistema de archivos tipo ZMI Personalizar las vistas.

trans-unit.source: Remove Zope Help System fossils so this products is compatible with Zope 5
trans-unit.target: Eliminar los fósiles del Sistema de Ayuda de Zope para que este producto sea compatible con Zope 5

trans-unit.source: Remove antique usage of marker attributes in favor of interfaces, leaving BBB behind for places potentially affecting third-party code. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/440)
trans-unit.target: Remove antique usage of marker attributes in favor of interfaces, leaving BBB behind for places potentially affecting third-party code. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/440)

trans-unit.source: Remove dependency on
trans-unit.target: Eliminar la dependencia de

trans-unit.source: Remove support for testing using
trans-unit.target: Quitar el soporte para la prueba usando

trans-unit.source: Removed extraneous “Cache” tab from FS-based skin objects. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/343)
trans-unit.target: Removed extraneous “Cache” tab from FS-based skin objects. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/343)

trans-unit.source: Removed superGetAttr fallback from SkinnableObjectManager. None of its base classes have a
trans-unit.target: Eliminó el recurso de SuperGetAttr de SkinnableObjectManager.Ninguna de sus clases base tiene un

trans-unit.source: Removed zope.app.testing dependency.
trans-unit.target: Se eliminó la dependencia de las pruebas de zope.app.

trans-unit.source: Require at least Zope 2.13.12.
trans-unit.target: Requiere al menos el Zope 2.13.12.

trans-unit.source: Resolve
trans-unit.target: Resuelva

trans-unit.source: Set default encoding values on FSDTMLMethods.
trans-unit.target: Establecer valores de codificación por defecto en FSDTMLMethods.

trans-unit.source: Skinnable and MembershipTool: Removed support for missing REQUEST argument. ‘changeSkin’, ‘setupCurrentSkin’ and ‘credentialsChanged’ will no longer try to acquire the request if it is not passed in explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Skinnable and MembershipTool: Removed support for missing REQUEST argument. ‘changeSkin’, ‘setupCurrentSkin’ and ‘credentialsChanged’ will no longer try to acquire the request if it is not passed in explicitly.

trans-unit.source: Skinnable: The skins tool is now looked up as utility. ‘getSkinsFolderName’ is no longer supported, that method was removed.
trans-unit.target: Skinnable: The skins tool is now looked up as utility. ‘getSkinsFolderName’ is no longer supported, that method was removed.

trans-unit.source: SkinnableObjectManager.__getattr__
trans-unit.target: SkinnableObjectManager.__getattr__

trans-unit.source: SkinnableObjectManager: Changed the way skins are set up. Acquisition wrapping no longer triggers ‘setupCurrentSkin’. This is now done on publishing traversal after the BeforeTraverseEvent triggers ‘setSite’. This fix replaces a temporary hack introduced in 2.1.0-beta, making sure ISkinsTool is looked up after setting the site.
trans-unit.target: SkinnableObjectManager: Changed the way skins are set up. Acquisition wrapping no longer triggers ‘setupCurrentSkin’. This is now done on publishing traversal after the BeforeTraverseEvent triggers ‘setSite’. This fix replaces a temporary hack introduced in 2.1.0-beta, making sure ISkinsTool is looked up after setting the site.

trans-unit.source: SkinsTool: Added the ability to do a diff comparison between items found using the portal_skins “Find” ZMI tab. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/238489)
trans-unit.target: SkinsTool: Added the ability to do a diff comparison between items found using the portal_skins “Find” ZMI tab. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/238489)

trans-unit.source: SkinsTool: Use the property API to get the member specific skin, because direct attribute access won’t work with PAS based membership. (http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/5904)
trans-unit.target: SkinsTool: Use the property API to get the member specific skin, because direct attribute access won’t work with PAS based membership. (http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/5904)

trans-unit.source: Skinstool import: Fix imports that manipulate existing skins. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/161732)
trans-unit.target: Skinstool import: Fix imports that manipulate existing skins. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/161732)

trans-unit.source: Specify supported Python versions using
trans-unit.target: Especificar las versiones de Python soportadas usando

trans-unit.source: Target use with Zope 4: no longer support 2.13.x.
trans-unit.target: Uso del objetivo con el Zope 4:ya no soporta 2.13.x.

trans-unit.source: Testing: Derive test layers from ZopeLite layer if available.
trans-unit.target: Probando:Derivar las capas de prueba de la capa ZopeLite si está disponible.

trans-unit.source: This product declares the key framework services for the Zope Content Management Framework (CMF).
trans-unit.target: Este producto declara los servicios marco clave para el Marco de Gestión de Contenidos de Zope (CMF).

trans-unit.source: Tool lookup and registration is now done “the Zope 3 way” as utilities, see http://svn.zope.org/CMF/branches/2.1/docs/ToolsAreUtilities.stx?view=auto
trans-unit.target: Tool lookup and registration is now done “the Zope 3 way” as utilities, see http://svn.zope.org/CMF/branches/2.1/docs/ToolsAreUtilities.stx?view=auto
Tools and PortalFolder: Removed support for deprecated marker attributes. ‘_isDirectoryView’, ‘_isPortalRoot’, ‘_isTypeInformation’ and ‘_isAWorkflow’ are no longer supported.

trans-unit.source: TypeInformation and TypesTool: Added support for add view actions. Type infos now have a new ‘add_view_expr’ property and implement IAction. ‘listActions’ of the types tool includes type infos as ‘add’ actions.
trans-unit.target: TypeInformation and TypesTool: Added support for add view actions. Type infos now have a new ‘add_view_expr’ property and implement IAction. ‘listActions’ of the types tool includes type infos as ‘add’ actions.

trans-unit.source: TypeInformation: Added ‘getIconExprObject’ method. This replaces the now deprecated ‘getIcon’ method.
trans-unit.target: TypeInformation: Added ‘getIconExprObject’ method. This replaces the now deprecated ‘getIcon’ method.

trans-unit.source: TypeInformation: DCWorkflow instances define a method and a guard for vetoing object creation, but it was never used. Now TypeInformation objects will consult these guard conditions during object creation. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/308947)
trans-unit.target: TypeInformation: DCWorkflow instances define a method and a guard for vetoing object creation, but it was never used. Now TypeInformation objects will consult these guard conditions during object creation. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/308947)

trans-unit.source: TypeInformation: Removed redundant ‘content_icon’ property. For backwards compatibility old settings containing ‘content_icon’ instead of ‘icon_expr’ are converted on import. CMFDefault provides the necessary upgrade steps for migrating existing sites.
trans-unit.target: TypeInformation: Removed redundant ‘content_icon’ property. For backwards compatibility old settings containing ‘content_icon’ instead of ‘icon_expr’ are converted on import. CMFDefault provides the necessary upgrade steps for migrating existing sites.

trans-unit.source: TypesTool: Corrected method signature of all_meta_types to have an interface keyword argument, as per the underlying OFS.ObjectManager interface declaration.
trans-unit.target: Herramienta de tipos:Corregida la firma del método de all_meta_types para tener un argumento de palabra clave de la interfaz,según la declaración de la interfaz subyacente de OFS.ObjectManager.

trans-unit.source: TypesTool: Made it an ordered container. This allows to control the order of the add actions.
trans-unit.target: Herramienta de tipos:Lo hizo un contenedor ordenado.Esto permite controlar el orden de las acciones de adición.
TypesTool: Pass ‘object’ through to TypeInformation objects’ ‘listActions’. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/482)

trans-unit.source: TypesTool: Refactored content creation. Moved addCreator call to IObjectCreatedEvent handler and moved notifyWorkflowCreated and indexObject calls to IObjectAddedEvent handler. Please make sure all oldstyle content factory methods use _setObject with suppress_events=True. CMF factory methods don’t finish object creation, so they should not send the IObjectAddedEvent.
trans-unit.target: TypesTool: Refactored content creation. Moved addCreator call to IObjectCreatedEvent handler and moved notifyWorkflowCreated and indexObject calls to IObjectAddedEvent handler. Please make sure all oldstyle content factory methods use _setObject with suppress_events=True. CMF factory methods don’t finish object creation, so they should not send the IObjectAddedEvent.

trans-unit.source: UndoTool: Fixed ‘listUndoableTransactionsFor’. The required ‘object’ argument is now respected. This doesn’t change the behavior as long as ‘object’ is the site root object.
trans-unit.target: UndoTool: Fixed ‘listUndoableTransactionsFor’. The required ‘object’ argument is now respected. This doesn’t change the behavior as long as ‘object’ is the site root object.

trans-unit.source: Update Products.MailHost dependency to 4.0 [dataflake]
trans-unit.target: Actualizar Productos.dependencia de MailHost a 4.0 [dataflake]

trans-unit.source: Update tests to
trans-unit.target: Actualizar las pruebas para

trans-unit.source: Updated setDefaultRoles to use the addPermission API if available.
trans-unit.target: Actualizado setDefaultRoles para usar el addPermission API si está disponible.

trans-unit.source: Updated test to work with zope.contenttype >= 3.4.3.
trans-unit.target: Updated test to work with zope.contenttype >= 3.4.3.

trans-unit.source: Updated to the 0.3 release of five.localsitemanager.
trans-unit.target: Actualizado a la versión 0.3 de 5.localsitemanager.

trans-unit.source: Use
trans-unit.target: Utilice

trans-unit.source: Use security declaration decorator notation where possible. [dataflake]
trans-unit.target: Use la anotación de la declaración de seguridad del decorador cuando sea posible.[copo de datos]

trans-unit.source: Use the standard libraries doctest module.
trans-unit.target: Usa el módulo de prueba de las bibliotecas estándar.

trans-unit.source: WorkflowTool: ‘notifyCreated’ no longer overrides assigned workflow states.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowTool: ‘notifyCreated’ no longer overrides assigned workflow states.

trans-unit.source: WorkflowTool: Added the IConfigurableWorkflowTool interface. This change includes the new ‘getDefaultChain’ and ‘listChainOverrides’ methods and an improved ‘setChainForPortalTypes’ method. The import handler now supports the ‘remove’ attribute for removing overrides. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/457)
trans-unit.target: WorkflowTool: Added the IConfigurableWorkflowTool interface. This change includes the new ‘getDefaultChain’ and ‘listChainOverrides’ methods and an improved ‘setChainForPortalTypes’ method. The import handler now supports the ‘remove’ attribute for removing overrides. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/457)

trans-unit.source: WorkflowTool: Passing the “magic” chain name “(Default)” to the setChainForPortalTypes method did not set the chain to the default chain value as expected. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/161702)
trans-unit.target: WorkflowTool: Passing the “magic” chain name “(Default)” to the setChainForPortalTypes method did not set the chain to the default chain value as expected. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/161702)

trans-unit.source: WorkflowTool: Using the ‘(Default)’ keyword for a type’s workflow chain will now reset any custom workflow chains for the type. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/475)
trans-unit.target: WorkflowTool: Using the ‘(Default)’ keyword for a type’s workflow chain will now reset any custom workflow chains for the type. (http://www.zope.org/Collectors/CMF/475)

trans-unit.source: ZClasses: Removed unmaintained support for ZClasses. Marked the ‘initializeBases*’ methods as deprecated.
trans-unit.target: ZClasses: Removed unmaintained support for ZClasses. Marked the ‘initializeBases*’ methods as deprecated.

trans-unit.source: ZMI: Prevent users from creating content through the ZMI by hiding the entry for “CMFCore Content”.
trans-unit.target: ZMI: Prevent users from creating content through the ZMI by hiding the entry for “CMFCore Content”.

trans-unit.source: actions tool export/import: The actions tool export/import mechanism is no longer attempting to handle actions stored on tools other than itself. Other tools are themselves responsible for their actions. The importer has been fixed to add all action providers to the actions tool, not just a select list of providers we know about. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/177675)
trans-unit.target: actions tool export/import: The actions tool export/import mechanism is no longer attempting to handle actions stored on tools other than itself. Other tools are themselves responsible for their actions. The importer has been fixed to add all action providers to the actions tool, not just a select list of providers we know about. (https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope-cmf/+bug/177675)

trans-unit.source: environment variable to disable any catalog optimization. This is mostly meant to be used so that tests which may need some adaptation do not break after updating to this version. Set it to
trans-unit.target: variable de entorno para desactivar cualquier optimización del catálogo.Esto está pensado principalmente para que las pruebas que puedan necesitar alguna adaptación no se rompan después de la actualización a esta versión.Ponlo en

trans-unit.source: for Python 3 compatibility. (#54) [ale-rt, vangheem]

trans-unit.source: interfaces: Added ‘IMember’ interface.
trans-unit.target: interfaces: Added ‘IMember’ interface.

trans-unit.source: interfaces: Added new interfaces for CMFCatalogAware methods. In the long run ICatalogAware, IWorkflowAware and IOpaqueItemManager will become deprecated. Don’t expect that CMF content always implements them.
trans-unit.target: interfaces: Added new interfaces for CMFCatalogAware methods. In the long run ICatalogAware, IWorkflowAware and IOpaqueItemManager will become deprecated. Don’t expect that CMF content always implements them.

trans-unit.source: interfaces: Fixed dotted names by setting __module__ explicitly.
trans-unit.target: interfaces:Fijación de nombres punteados mediante el establecimiento de __módulo__explícitamente.

trans-unit.source: interfaces: Fixed some docstrings. There is no IActionInformation. ActionInformation is an old action class that implements IAction, non-persistent IActionInfo objects adapt action objects to a given context.
trans-unit.target: interfaces:Arreglado algunas cuerdas de acoplamiento.No hay información de IAction.ActionInformation es una vieja clase de acción que implementa IAction,los objetos no persistentes de IActionInfo adaptan los objetos de acción a un contexto dado.

trans-unit.source: interfaces: Removed deprecated oldstyle interfaces.
trans-unit.target: interfaces:Eliminó las interfaces obsoletas de estilo antiguo.

trans-unit.source: intermediate (e.g., prefer importing ‘ClassSecurityInfo’ from ‘AccessControl.SecurityInfo’ rather than from ‘AccessControl’).
trans-unit.target: intermediate (e.g., prefer importing ‘ClassSecurityInfo’ from ‘AccessControl.SecurityInfo’ rather than from ‘AccessControl’).

trans-unit.source: removed the five.localsitemanager svn:external and its import hack in favor of stating the dependency for separate installation in DEPENDENCIES.txt and automatic installation in setup.py.
trans-unit.target: eliminó el cinco.localsitemanager svn:external y su hack de importación a favor de declarar la dependencia para la instalación separada en DEPENDENCIAS.txt y la instalación automática en setup.py.

trans-unit.source: returns correct native strings under Python 3. (#76)
trans-unit.target: returns correct native strings under Python 3. (#76)

trans-unit.source: setup handlers: Added export/import support for member data tool settings.
trans-unit.target: ...de los manipuladores de la instalación:Añadido soporte de exportación/importación para los ajustes de la herramienta de datos de los miembros.

trans-unit.source: setup handlers: All import and export steps are now registered globally.
trans-unit.target: ...de los manipuladores de la instalación:Todas las etapas de importación y exportación se registran ahora a nivel mundial.

trans-unit.source: setup handlers: Improved content type registry handler. The ‘insert-before’ and ‘insert-after’ directives are now supported.
trans-unit.target: setup handlers: Improved content type registry handler. The ‘insert-before’ and ‘insert-after’ directives are now supported.

trans-unit.source: setup handlers: Improved properties handler. It now works with properties using a default_charset other than UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: ...de los manipuladores de la instalación:Manejador de propiedades mejorado.Ahora funciona con propiedades que usan un default_charset distinto al UTF-8.

trans-unit.source: setup handlers: Removed support for CMF 1.5 CMFSetup profiles.
trans-unit.target: ...de los manipuladores de la instalación:Se ha eliminado el soporte para los perfiles de CMF 1.5 CMFSetup.

trans-unit.source: setup.py
trans-unit.target: setup.py

trans-unit.source: skins: Changed encoding of translated portal_status_messages. Now getBrowserCharset is used to play nice with Five forms. Customized setRedirect and getMainGlobals scripts have to be updated.
trans-unit.target: pieles:Cambió la codificación de los mensajes traducidos de portal_status_messages.Ahora getBrowserCharset se usa para jugar bien con cinco formas.Los scripts personalizados setRedirect y getMainGlobals tienen que ser actualizados.

trans-unit.target: support unset portal_skins request variables in HTTP headers (see https://dev.plone.org/ticket/10071) [fRiSi]

trans-unit.source: testing: Added test layers for setting up ZCML.
trans-unit.target: ...de las pruebas:Se añadieron capas de prueba para configurar el ZCML.

trans-unit.source: testing: Removed broken run function. Unit test modules are no longer directly executable.
trans-unit.target: ...de las pruebas:Se ha eliminado la función de carrera rota.Los módulos de prueba de la unidad ya no son directamente ejecutables.

trans-unit.source: tests base: Removed obsolete test utils.
trans-unit.target: base de pruebas:Eliminado las utilidades de prueba obsoletas.

trans-unit.source: tests base: Tightened security for anonymous test user.
trans-unit.target: base de pruebas:Seguridad reforzada para el usuario anónimo de la prueba.

trans-unit.source: tool interfaces: Replace non-existing IMember interface with the correct IMemberData.
trans-unit.target: interfaces de la herramienta:Reemplazar la interfaz del IMember no existente con los datos del IMember correcto.

trans-unit.source: tools: Converted all tools into local utilities. The registration is not done here, see CMFDefault as an example of a registration via GenericSetup.
trans-unit.target: tools: Converted all tools into local utilities. The registration is not done here, see CMFDefault as an example of a registration via GenericSetup.

trans-unit.source: traversal: Added ++add++ namespace for add views.
trans-unit.target: ...transversal:Añadido el espacio de nombres ++add++para añadir vistas.

trans-unit.source: true
trans-unit.target: verdadero

trans-unit.source: utils: Add a new optional argument to ContentInit that allows hiding a content item’s ZMI add list entry. The default is to leave the item visible, which reflects the previous behavior.
trans-unit.target: utils: Add a new optional argument to ContentInit that allows hiding a content item’s ZMI add list entry. The default is to leave the item visible, which reflects the previous behavior.

trans-unit.source: utils: Added FakeExecutableObject. It can be used to set proxy roles in trusted code.
trans-unit.target: utils:Añadido FakeExecutableObject.Puede ser usado para establecer roles proxy en código de confianza.

trans-unit.source: utils: Fixed ‘_OldCacheHeaders’ and ‘_FSCacheHeaders’ methods. DateTimeErrors caused by invalid HTTP headers were not caught.
trans-unit.target: utils: Fixed ‘_OldCacheHeaders’ and ‘_FSCacheHeaders’ methods. DateTimeErrors caused by invalid HTTP headers were not caught.

trans-unit.source: utils: Marked ‘minimalpath’ and ‘expandpath’ as deprecated.
trans-unit.target: utils: Marked ‘minimalpath’ and ‘expandpath’ as deprecated.

trans-unit.source: utils: Removed deprecated functions. ‘getToolByInterfaceName’, ‘initializeBasesPhase1’, ‘initializeBasesPhase2’, ‘expandpath’ and ‘minimalpath’ are no longer available.
trans-unit.target: utils: Removed deprecated functions. ‘getToolByInterfaceName’, ‘initializeBasesPhase1’, ‘initializeBasesPhase2’, ‘expandpath’ and ‘minimalpath’ are no longer available.
